SELECT u.id, u.username, u.truename, u.password, u.email, u.phone, u.create_time, u.create_user, u.update_time, u.update_user, u.dept_id, r.id as role_id, r.role_name, r.role_code, b.dept_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role_user ru ON u.id = ru.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ru.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept b on u.dept_id = b.id
and u.dept_id in (select id from sys_dept where pids like '%${deptId},%' or id=#{deptId})
and (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%' ) OR u.truename LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and (r.role_code != 'admin' or r.role_code is null)
SELECT t1.id, t1.role_name, t1.role_code, CASE WHEN t2.id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS checked from sys_role t1 left join sys_role_user t2 on t1.id = t2.role_id and t2.user_id = #{userId}
